{"id":1048240360,"lang":"typescript","lang_name":"TypeScript","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1694596460,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"59 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1048240360/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Reverse Vowels of a String","memory":"50.4 MB","code":"function reverseVowels(s: string): string {\n    let consonants = s.split(/[aeiouAEIOU]/);\n    let vowels = s.split(/[^aeiouAEIOU]+/).join(\"\").split(\"\").reverse();\n    // console.log(consonants, vowels)\n    let result = [];\n    let vowelIndex = 0;\n    for(let consonant of consonants) {\n        if(consonant !== \"\") {\n            result.push(consonant);\n        }\n        result.push(vowels[vowelIndex++])\n    }\n    return result.join(\"\")\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"reverse-vowels-of-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
